content: प्रक्रम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To go forward, proceed, walk on; <ls>Bk. 15. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To go, set out, march forth. {@--3@} To issue forth, depart. {@--4@} To go across, <ab>pass.</ab> {@--5@} To begin, commence (<ab>Atm.</ab>) (with <ab>inf.</ab>) प्रचक्रमे च प्रतिवक्तुमुत्तरं <ls>R. 3. 47</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 15</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 2</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">5. 18.</ls> {@--6@} To undertake, apply oneself to. {@--7@} To behave towards (with <ab>loc.</ab>).
